properties.Name: HazardSeverityCategory
properties.Description:
The Hazard Severity Category potentially associated with an inventory Item.

a. Category I, Catastrophic--Hazard may cause death or total loss of a bodily system. 

b. Category II, Critical--Hazard may cause severe bodily injury, severe occupational illness, or major damage to a bodily system. 

c. Category III, Marginal--Hazard may cause minor bodily injury, minor occupational illness, or minor damage to a bodily system. 

d. Category IV, Negligible--Hazard would cause less than minor bodily injury, minor occupational illness, or minor bodily system damage.

Columns.Name: HazardSeverityCategoryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Hazard Severity Category.

Columns.Name: HazardSeverityCategoryName
Columns.Description: The name of a Hazard Severity Category.

Columns.Name: HazardSeverityCategoryDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Hazard Severity Category.

Properties.Description:
The Hazard Severity Category potentially associated with an inventory Item.

a. Category I, Catastrophic--Hazard may cause death or total loss of a bodily system. 

b. Category II, Critical--Hazard may cause severe bodily injury, severe occupational illness, or major damage to a bodily system. 

c. Category III, Marginal--Hazard may cause minor bodily injury, minor occupational illness, or minor damage to a bodily system. 

d. Category IV, Negligible--Hazard would cause less than minor bodily injury, minor occupational illness, or minor bodily system damage.
